roleset.name: intervene, come between to create a resolution

example.name: these verbs are getting progressively weirder
example.text: Common Cause asked both the Senate Ethics Committee and the Justice Department to investigate $1 million in political gifts by Arizona businessman Charles Keating to five U.S. senators who [*T*] interceded with thrift-industry regulators for him.

roleset.note: INTERCEDE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'intercede' based on sentences in wsj. No access to Verbnet at the moment. (from intercede.01-v predicate notes)
